channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: Jonathan "Jonny" Harris takes an up-close look at how Middleton has been surviving despite the challenges, and he serves up some laughs and smiles.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Land and Sea
channel.desc: Newfoundland and Labrador's spectacular rock isn't just something to be photographed; for many, jagged cliffs and banks of boulders are meant to be gripped and scaled; they are rock climbers.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Kayak to Klemtu

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Grand Designs Australia

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA

channel.desc: The chefs hope to score points with gooey brownies, get twisted over chocolate babkas and beat the heat with white chocolate-tiered celebration cakes.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Dragons' Den

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Still Standing

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: Oneida Nation of the Thames is hard at work reclaiming the economic, cultural and spiritual practices that were banned by government policies over the past 100 years.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: M'Chigeeng First Nation on Manitoulin Island was once the center for the Anishinaabe people; this changed dramatically when a series of treaties cut off the community from their traditional lands.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: The forced relocation of the Membertou First Nation 100 years ago sent the community into crisis; thanks to a bold economic plan, they have successfully pulled off a stunning transformation.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA

channel.title: Just for Laughs: Gags
channel.desc: There's no sound, but there sure are plenty of laughs. This crazy Quebec-based troupe uses the city as its stage, and its inhabitants, or victims, as characters! People are caught in a twisted yet funny web of comedic deception. This updated "Candid Camera" is a tad more risque and a little kookier with its practical jokes. The little snippets last only a few minutes, and some look more painful than others.
